item.title: Athlete2 Demo - Category Below Products
item.content:
Experience Elegance and Performance with Athlete2: Your Ultimate Magento 2 Theme

Welcome to Athlete2, where cutting-edge design meets seamless functionality. Dive into a world of unparalleled customization and user experience, tailored specifically for Magento 2 users who demand nothing but the best. Here's why Athlete2 stands out as the supreme choice for your online store:

Stunning Visuals.
Athlete2 boasts a captivating, modern design that immediately captures your visitors' attention. With its visually appealing layouts and intuitive navigation, your customers will enjoy a seamless browsing experience, effortlessly exploring your products.

Mobile-First Approach, Perfect Responsiveness.
In today's mobile-driven world, Athlete2 takes the lead with its mobile-first approach. Your website will look stunning and function flawlessly across all devices and screen sizes, ensuring that your customers can shop conveniently, whether they're on a smartphone, tablet, or desktop.

Unmatched Customization, Tailored to Your Brand.
One size doesn't fit all. Athlete2 understands that your brand is unique. With an array of customization options, you can personalize every aspect of your website, from colors and fonts to layout and content. Craft a digital storefront that mirrors your brand identity and captivates your audience.

Blazing Fast Performance, Higher Conversions.
Speed matters. Athlete2 is optimized for lightning-fast performance, ensuring that your website loads in the blink of an eye. Studies show that faster websites lead to higher conversion rates, meaning your visitors are more likely to turn into loyal customers, boosting your sales and revenue.

Dedicated Support and Regular Updates.
Your success is our priority. Athlete2 comes with dedicated customer support and regular updates, ensuring that your website remains secure, up-to-date, and equipped with the latest features. Have peace of mind knowing that our expert team is here to assist you every step of the way.

Trusted by Thousands, Loved by Customers.
Athlete2 has earned the trust of thousands of businesses worldwide. Its proven track record and positive user reviews are a testament to its reliability and effectiveness. Join the ranks of successful online entrepreneurs who have transformed their businesses with Athlete2.

Elevate your online store to new heights with Athlete2, the Magento 2 theme that combines aesthetics with functionality, creating an unforgettable shopping experience for your customers. Try Athlete2 today and witness the transformation of your eCommerce venture into a powerhouse of sales and customer satisfaction.

item.title: Categories Widget
item.content:
new in 1.8

Subcategories Widget

Choose from various layouts, set columns and show/hide different elements to get the desired look.

 

Grid

Columns

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" categories="289,283,284,286,285,326,287,328,327,331,288,290" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="100" thumb_width="140" show_product_count="0" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" vertical="0" custom_width="0" column_width_fit="0" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2"}}

Custom Width with Autofit

Instead of setting columns you can set min width of the item and it will fill the available space or jump to the next line if there is not enough space for all item.

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" categories="289,283,284,286,285,326,287" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="100" thumb_width="140" show_product_count="0" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" vertical="0" column_width="200" column_width_fit="1"}}
 

Vertical Grid

 

Text Right Layout

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" parent_category="283" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="60" thumb_width="84" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="5" hover_effect="zoom-in-item" vertical="1" padding="10px 20px" border_radius="4px" text_font_size="16px" num_bg_hover_color="rgb(11, 103, 209)" num_text_hover_color="white"}}
 

Text Left Layout

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" parent_category="283" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="60" thumb_width="84" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="6" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" vertical="1" padding="10px 20px" border_radius="4px" text_font_size="16px" num_bg_hover_color="black" num_text_hover_color="white"}}
 

Text Left Layout, Image disabled, Custom colors

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" parent_category="283" show_category_image="0" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="5" vertical="1" custom_width="0" columns_align_center="0" bg_color="rgb(45 45 45)" text_color="white" num_bg_color="#404040" num_text_color="#cdcdcd"}}
 

Text Left Layout, Image disabled, H2 title tag

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" parent_category="283" show_category_image="0" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="h2" style="5" vertical="1" custom_width="0" columns_align_center="0" bg_color="transparent" }}
 

Css Based Slider

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\SubcategoriesSlider" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_slider.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285,326,287,328,327,331,288,290" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="100" thumb_width="140" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" columns_align_center="0" nav="1" nav_style="s-fadeover" nav_always="1" scrollbar="1" drag="0" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2"}}
 

Owl Carousel Slider

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\SubcategoriesOwl" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_owlcarousel.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285,326,287,328,327,331,288,290" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="100" thumb_width="140" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" rewind="1" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" columns_align_center="0" nav="1" nav_always="1" dots="1" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2" dots_align="center" dots_style="rounded"}}
 

A few more examples

Rounded edges

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285,326" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="100" thumb_width="140" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" vertical="0" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2" border_radius="10px"}}
 

Circle Image layout

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="295,301,289,286,307,331" show_category_image="1" thumb="" thumb_height="255" thumb_width="255" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="3" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" vertical="0" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2"}}
 

Circle Image layout, Image Only

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="295,301,289,286,307,331" show_category_image="1" thumb="" thumb_height="255" thumb_width="255" show_product_count="0" show_category_name="0" category_name_tag="span" style="3" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" vertical="0" columns_desktop="6" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="3" columns_mobile="2"}}
 

Left/Right Layouts with columns

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="60" thumb_width="84" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="5" hover_effect="zoom-out-item" vertical="0" columns_desktop="5" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" padding="10px 20px"}} {{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285" show_category_image="1" thumb="custom" thumb_height="60" thumb_width="84" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="6" hover_effect="move-up" vertical="0" columns_desktop="5" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" padding="10px 20px"}}
 

Text only grid, H2 title

You can hide each element such as image, counter or text. Choose tag and set font size for text.

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285" show_category_image="0" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="h2" style="1" vertical="0" column_width="300" column_width_fit="1" columns_align_center="0" bg_color="transparent" }} {{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Subcategories" template="Olegnax_Athlete2::widgets/subcategories_grid.phtml" categories="289,283,284,286,285" show_category_image="0" show_product_count="1" show_category_name="1" category_name_tag="span" style="1" hover_effect="move-up" vertical="0" columns_desktop="5" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" padding="20px"}}

item.title: Infinite Slide
item.content:
-
new in 1.8

Infinite Slider Widgets

Starting from version 1.8 theme comes with horizontal infinitely running slider and vertical text rotator.

-

1. Horizontal Slider

You can add a simple text directly in a widget text area or set a cms block as a content source.

-

Simple Content

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\ISlide" custom_content="Flash Sale" slide_time="900" items_width="auto" clone="1" pause_on_hover="0" bg_color="#211f20" text_color="white" text_font_size="16" text_font_weight="700" padding="4px" absolute="0" gap="35"}}
-

Cms Block Example

Below are couple of examples of a cms blocks as a slider content source with pause on hover enabled.

{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\ISlide" block_id="athlete2-above-footer-banner-islider-fi" slide_time="10000" pause_on_hover="1" items_width="auto" clone="1" padding="16px 0" bg_color="rgb(225, 238, 98)" text_color="black"}}
-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\ISlide" block_id="athlete2-demo-islide-banners" slide_time="35000" clone="1" clones_amount="3" gap="25px" pause_on_hover="1" absolute="0" padding="0" no_overflow="0"}}
-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\Video" video_url="athlete2/Demos/fi/video/sample.mp4" poster_url="" autoplay_video="1" lazy_video="1" show_controls="0" show_play_button="1" button_position_vertical="bottom" button_color="white" button_bg="black" stretch="1"}}
-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\ISlide" block_id="athlete2-demo-Infinite-scroll-line-cherry-picked" slide_time="5000" items_width="auto" clone="1" pause_on_hover="0" rotation="15" bg_color="#4ae4bd" text_color="black" text_font_size="12" text_font_weight="500" padding="8px" absolute="1" left="23%" top="12%" left_mobile="-5%" top_mobile="0" gap="35"}}
Powered by AI

The gift of following your passion, anywhere.

Rotation and Position

You can set roation and absolute positioning to place slider above other content in an eye-catching way.

-

Allow Overflow - Enabled

By default content will be limited to the width of the slider but you can allow it to go out of the "frame".
On example below content is running from edge to edge of the screen without any limitations.

-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\ISlide" block_id="athlete2-demo-islide-banners" slide_time="35000" clone="1" clones_amount="3" gap="25px" pause_on_hover="1" absolute="0" padding="0" no_overflow="1"}}
-

* Note that this option will only change overflowing behaviour for this particular slider but other content blocks (where you placed the slider) can also hide overflowing content.

-

2. Vertical Text Rotator

Add lines of text to rotate, set speed sizes and colors.

-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\VSlide" content="Appliances||Computers||Tablets||Cell Phones||Audio & Video||Cameras||Furniture||Smart Home||Technology||Fitness||Outdoor||Living" text_color="black" text_font_size="52" text_font_size_mobile="30" bottom_line="1"}}
-
{{widget type="Olegnax\Athlete2\Block\VSlide" content="Appliances||Computers||Tablets||Cell Phones||Audio & Video||Cameras||Furniture||Smart Home||Technology||Fitness||Outdoor||Living" text_color="black" text_font_size="36" text_font_size_mobile="26" bottom_line="0" bg_color="yellow" text_color="black" padding="20px" slide_time="10000"}}

item.title: Products List
item.content:
new in 1.8

Product Widget List Layouts

Choose from various layouts, set columns and show/hide different elements to get the desired look.

 

List Layout 1

This is a two columns layout where only image is moved to the left and everything else is in one column. Useful for list layout with multiple columns.

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="1" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::list.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="1" show_compare="1" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="1" show_in_stock="1" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}}

List Layout 2

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="1" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv2.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="1" show_compare="1" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="1" show_in_stock="1" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}}

List Layout 3

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="1" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv3.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="1" show_compare="1" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="1" show_in_stock="1" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}}

List Layout 4

This is basically a four columns layouts: image column, left column with info and a right column with price and action which are also separate to two different columns. This layout is designed to be fullwidth (1 column)

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="1" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv4.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="1" show_compare="1" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="1" show_in_stock="1" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}}

Items Count

You can show product position number in current list left to the image. Can be useful when you want to make accent on the product position lets say when you show top 5 best sellers.

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\ProductsByCategory" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="3" category_ids="2" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv3.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="0" review_count="0" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="0" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="1"}}

List Layout Columns

You can set columns for product list widget same as for products grid but keep in mind that not all layouts will work well with column so choose columns wisely.

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="8" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::list.phtml" columns_desktop="4" columns_desktop_small="4" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="0" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="0" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}} {{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="6" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::list.phtml" columns_desktop="3" columns_desktop_small="3" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="0" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="0" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}} {{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\ProductsByCategory" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" category_ids="2" products_count="6" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv3.phtml" columns_desktop="3" columns_desktop_small="3" columns_tablet="2" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="1" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="0" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}} {{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="4" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv4.phtml" columns_desktop="2" columns_desktop_small="2" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="0" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="0"}}
-

A few more examples

-

Popular on Sale

{{widget type="Olegnax\ProductSlider\Block\OnSaleProducts" show_title="0" title_side_line="0" show_pager="0" products_count="3" template="Olegnax_ProductSlider::listv4.phtml" columns_desktop="1" columns_desktop_small="1" columns_tablet="1" columns_mobile="1" loop="0" rewind="0" nav="0" dots="0" autoplay="0" show_addtocart="0" show_wishlist="0" show_compare="0" show_review="1" review_count="1" hide_name="0" hide_price="0" show_desc="0" show_quickview="1" quickview_position="" show_stock_status="0" show_in_stock="0" show_swatches="0" products_layout_centered="0" thumb_carousel="0" banners_enabled="0" bordered_style="" show_num="1"}}

item.content:

item.title: Typography
item.content:
Heading H1 Huge and Huge Spacing:

this is huge

<h1 class="huge huge-spacing">this is huge</h1>
 

Huge Heading 

<h1 class="huge">Huge Heading</h1>
 

Big Heading

<h1 class="big ">Big Heading</h1>
 

Heading H1

Heading H2

Heading H3

Heading H4

Heading H5
Heading H6
small subtitle 
<span class="small-subtitle">small subtitle</span>
 

Heading classes on elements

You can add heading style to any element using following classes .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6.

link h5 headingspan h3 heading
 

Hightlight

Add at-highlight class to element to wrap it with background

header with hightlight
 

Alternative Hightlight

Wrap text in <em class="hightlighted-text"> ... </em> class to element to add fat underline. Works best on big headings. Additionally you can add class lower to move underline lower.

Highlighted Text and Highlighted Text Lower
 
<span class="h3"><em class="hightlighted-text">Highlighted</em> Text</span> and <span class="h1"><em class="hightlighted-text lower">Highlighted</em> Text Lower</span>
 

Link hover styles

 

You can various ways to make link with bg on hover. You can add class bg-hover directly to the a tag.

Or you can add one of these classes to the wrapper element and all links inside will be with background on hover: std,llinks-bg-hover.

You can clear links hover for specific link by applying link-clear class to link tag. Add clean-list class to ul element or wrapper to remove dots and padding from all list elements.

Alternatively you can add double underline on link hover by adding underlined-links class to wrapper.

 
  • BG on HOVER
  • Running
  • Basketball
  • Training
  • Soccer
  • BG on HOVER
  • Shirts
  • T-Shirts
  • Hoodies
  • Jackets & Vests
  • UNDERLINED LINKS ON HOVER
  • Where's my order?
  • What payment options can I use?
  • What is personalisation policy?
  • How do I get the latest high-demand sneakers?
  • UNDERLINED LINKS ON HOVER
  • Where's my order?
  • What payment options can I use?
  • What is personalisation policy?
  • How do I get the latest high-demand sneakers?
 

Bigger content text

You can make content text bigger by adding big-text class.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

 

Text alignment

Use following classes to align texta-center, a-left, a-right

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
 

Spacers

You can easily add some extra space by adding div with following classes: spacer-big, spacer-medium, spacer-regular, spacer-small

<div class="spacer-big"> </div>
 

Hide on mobile

You can hide elements on mobile ot tablet by adding following classes to element: hide-on-tablet, hide-on-mobile

 

Remove spacing from columns

Add no-spacing or no-gutters class to row to remove padding and margin from row and columns .

 
 
shop now
 
shop now explore
 

Align vertical and Max width

Adding ox-max-width-500 to element will make it centered and set max width to 500. You can add ox-max-width- classes from 500-1000 with step 100. To align content vertically use following classes: col-align-vertical - on col element. block-align-vertical - inside col element.

<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
		<div class="block-align-vertical ox-max-width-500">
		...
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

or

<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6 col-align-vertical">
		<div class="ox-max-width-500">
		...
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
limited time offer

SALE UP TO 50% OFF
on new collection

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

shop now

 

Tables

Added wrapper for table with following classes to style it. table-bordered - Add bottom borders for row. table-header-border - add double border below table header (th) elements. table-header-bg - add black background for table header (th) elements. overflow-y - make table scroll-able if it is wider than the page. You need this for small resolutions.

<div class="table-bordered table-header-border overflow-y"> ...your table here... </div>

Clean margin, padding

no-margin - remove margin from element. no-padding - remove padding from element. clear-p - remove margin from all p elements.

Additionally add or remove margin to elements depending on screen resolution:

ox-margin-lg, ox-margin-lg-no, ox-margin-md, ox-margin-md-no, ox-margin-sm, ox-margin-sm-no, ox-margin, ox-margin-no
 

Stick to page footer

Use this class to remove page bottom spacingpage-bottom-padding

 
stick to page bottom

item.title: Brands Widget
item.content:
Brands Widget

You can add brands as slider or grid anywhere with our widget. You can set brand image size for each widget, grid columns, and set what brands to show exactly by their names. Additionally you can choose hover effect.

 
 

Brands Slider

 
{{widget type="Olegnax\BrandSlider\Block\BrandSlider" items_list="" height="140" width="178" auto_scroll="3" scroll_items="1" rewind="1" nav="show" image_hover="default" template="Olegnax_BrandSlider::brandslider.phtml"}}
 

Brands Grid

 
{{widget type="Olegnax\BrandSlider\Block\BrandSlider" items_list="" height="100" width="100" scroll_items="1" rewind="0" nav="show" image_hover="default" template="Olegnax_BrandSlider::brandsgrid.phtml" columns_desktop="10" columns_desktop_small="8" columns_tablet="6" columns_mobile="4"}}
 

Brands Grid with Selected Brands only.

 
{{widget type="Olegnax\BrandSlider\Block\BrandSlider" items_list="CC Shoes,Abibas, Athlete2,Holy Haters,Okey,Puma,Salaman" height="140" width="178" scroll_items="1" rewind="0" nav="show" image_hover="overlay" template="Olegnax_BrandSlider::brandsgrid.phtml" columns_desktop="7" columns_desktop_small="7" columns_tablet="4" columns_mobile="4"}}

item.title: Buttons
item.content:
Theme Buttons

Athlete 2 Theme comes with 5 button styles, 7 sizes, plus two mobile sizes. Add medium-s or small-s class to button to change its size on mobile.

 
 

Default Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer

Outline Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer

Simple Hover Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer
 

Naked Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer

Underlined Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer

Secondary Color Button

  • Small
  • Normal
  • Medium
  • Big
  • Big Wider
  • Long
  • Longer
